original_text: ‘You say, “We have not made ourselves unclean. We do not worship the idols of Baal.” But remember what you have done in the valleys. 2: They worshipped false gods in the valleys. See Jeremiah 7:31-32; 19:1-6. You hurry to find another idol that you can worship. Like a female camel, you cannot control yourselves. ‘You say, “We have not made ourselves unclean. We do not worship the idols of Baal.” But remember what you have done in the valleys. 2: They worshipped false gods in the valleys. See Jeremiah 7:31-32; 19:1-6. We do not worship the idols of Baal.” But remember what you have done in the valleys. 2: They worshipped false gods in the valleys. See Jeremiah 7:31-32; 19:1-6. You hurry to find another idol that you can worship. Like a female camel, you cannot control yourselves. ‘You say, “We have not made ourselves unclean.
korean_text: 네가 어찌 말하기를 나는 더럽혀지지 아니하였다 바알들의 뒤를 따르지 아니하였다 하겠느냐 골짜기 속에 있는 네 길을 보라 네 행한 바를 알 것이니라 발이 빠른 암낙타가 그의 길을 어지러이 달리는 것과 같았으며

sentences.original_text: We have not made ourselves unclean
We do not worship the idols of Baal
But remember what you have done in the valleys
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 너희가 골짜기에서 행한 것을 기억하라

sentences.original_text: They worshipped false gods in the valleys
You hurry to find another idol
